hero.p: I'm a software engineer with experience in corporate environments. I'm currently seeking full-time or freelance opportunities in front-end development. Check out my work, and feel free to reach out if you're interested in collaborating.

experiences.paragraph: Designed and implemented ReactJS components for ClashStats, a startup’s web application built using Next.js. Built case study projects to deepen expertise in modern front-end frameworks and UI/UX design workflows. Explored Astro, View Transitions API, Figma, and modern design systems to improve interface design and consistency.

Led the development of new features, enhancements, and bug-fixes for a micro-services app used in HPE-associated factories worldwide built using React, Docker, Java, Spring, ActiveMQ, and more. Identified and implemented solutions for issues in production. Designed and developed multiple parts of the web app's user interface used to monitor the app’s health. Optimized and maintained the Jenkins CI/CD pipeline.

Designed and developed the website for an international event being hosted by the institute for informational purposes and to automatically capture volunteer’s data. Developed a plugin to integrate WordPress with GoogleSheets to generate official record of event registration.

Migrated features from the UI of a Test Executive application from GWT to ReactJS with FLUX. Re-designed many views, implemented new features and created reusable React components. Researched, identified and fixed performance bottlenecks related to real-time updates and rendering.

Designed and deployed a normalized relational database using MySQL, developed front-end (AngularJS) features and back-end (PHP) functionality such as role-based access control, data input, sign-up, login, session management, menu’s according to role, and more.

stages.title: Project Request
stages.description: Submit your project details to me via email so I can get an idea of what you are looking for. Expect a response within 48hrs to schedule a meeting to discuss your project.

stages.title: First Meeting
stages.description: Let’s know each other and see if we are a good fit to work together. This is a moment to discuss your goals, requirements and next steps in our journey collaborating together.

stages.title: Proposal
stages.description: Once I have gathered enough information about the project requirements, I will send you a proposal that will document the next steps, estimated dates and the cost upfront.

stages.title: UX/UI Design
stages.description: After studying the provided material, I will design the UI. Regular updates and communication are essential aspects of my workflow, I will keep you in the loop.

stages.title: Design Agreement
stages.description: I will send to you the designed product for you to review.  If you want any updates, you have up to two free revisions, then a revision fee will be added depending on the changes.

stages.title: Software Development
stages.description: In this stage we will start the development and implementation of everything that was agreed after the design or proposal phases.

stages.title: Product Deployment
stages.description: We are ready to deploy and launch your project into production and make it available for your users / customers to use.

stages.title: Guidance Meeting
stages.description: After the product’s launch, let’s meet to guide you on how to use the application and so you can ask any questions you have.

footnote.1: This is my personal process, but I’m comfortable adapting to team workflows like Agile or Scrum.
footnote.2: The design and agreement of it (stages 4-5) can be omitted if you already have a design for your project.

bio.p1: I’m a software engineer with over 5 years of experience, ranging from small non-profits to large tech companies with ambitious goals.
bio.p2: I thrive on tackling diverse challenges, from designing and developing intuitive UI/UX components to building production-grade backend services in collaboration with Agile teams. Whether I’m solving problems through code, crafting elegant designs, or sketching out ideas on paper, I bring creativity and a commitment to quality that’s hard to match.
bio.p3: Outside of work, I find inspiration through walking on nature, photography, traveling, and spending time in my garden. My curiosity and hunger for knowledge drive me to constantly learn and innovate. For me, creativity, work, and play are all deeply interconnected.
